title: Fed action to reinforce expansionary fiscal policy

content.question: If the Federal Reserve wishes to use monetary policy to reinforce Congress' fiscal policy changes, it should

choices.label: decrease its administered interest rates when government spending is increased
decrease its administered interest rates when government spending is decreased
increase its administered interest rates when government spending is increased
increase its administered interest rates when income taxes are decreased
decrease its administered interest rates when income taxes are increased

content.answer: decrease its administered interest rates when government spending is increased

topic.text: 5.1: Fiscal and Monetary Policy Actions in the Short Run
